thumb.name: Very Special Father
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love to a Very %3Cbr%3ESpecial Father%3Cbr%3Efrom Gene%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA father who%26#146;s special%3Cbr%3Eand wonderful. too.%3Cbr%3EWho%26#146;s loved very much%3Cbr%3Eevery day the year through %26#151;%3Cbr%3EA father like that%3Cbr%3Eis a father like you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing You%3Cbr%3Ea Very Happy%3Cbr%3EFather%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: I'll Always Need You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDad...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI may not need you%3Cbr%3Eto hold my hand anymore %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ebut I'll always need you%3Cbr%3Eto hold me in your heart!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELove You Lots%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Mindy%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Our Extra-Special Daddy
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe Love You.%3Cbr%3EDaddy%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EXO%3Cbr%3EXO%3Cbr%3EXO%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELots of hugs%3Cbr%3EAnd kisses. too.%3Cbr%3EFor Father's Day%3Cbr%3EAnd all the year through.%3Cbr%3E'Cause there's no daddy%3Cbr%3ENear or far%3Cbr%3EAs extra special%3Cbr%3EAs you are!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Jason.%3Cbr%3EJessica. and Justin!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Dad. did anyone ever tell you...?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Dad. it's Dana! Did anyone ever tell you what a good-looking. intelligent. talented%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;family you have!?? Happy Father's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Dad and Father-in-law
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom the Two%3Cbr%3Eof Us.%3Cbr%3EDad.%3Cbr%3Eon Father's Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt means so much%3Cbr%3Ehaving a father%3Cbr%3Ewho's as special a person%3Cbr%3Eas you are.%3Cbr%3Eand it means even more%3Cbr%3Ewhen he's such%3Cbr%3Ea good father-in-law besides.%3Cbr%3ESo here's a warm wish%3Cbr%3Ethat your Father's Day is%3Cbr%3Eenjoyable and relaxing.%3Cbr%3Eand that life always brings you%3Cbr%3Eall the wonderful things%3Cbr%3Eyou so deserve.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love %3Cbr%3Efrom Jeanette and Jared%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hope Love Shows! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EGrandpa.%3Cbr%3Efrom%3Cbr%3EKayla and Zach%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho makes happy smiles appear%3Cbr%3EEvery time that he is near?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho is loved more%3Cbr%3Ethan he knows?%3Cbr%3EYou are. Grandpa!%3Cbr%3EHope it shows!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day

thumb.name: To a Wonderful Son
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo a%3Cbr%3EWonderful%3Cbr%3ESon%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;To see your son grow up%3Cbr%3Eand become a loving father%3Cbr%3Eis to know the wonderful feelings%3Cbr%3Eof love and pride.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re thought of today. Randy.%3Cbr%3Ewith more love and pride%3Cbr%3Ethan you can imagine.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy%3Cbr%3EFather%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: I Love...
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo My Husband. Fred%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI love...%3Cbr%3EBeing your partner.%3Cbr%3Eyour lover.%3Cbr%3Eyour wife.%3Cbr%3ESharing the closeness%3Cbr%3Eof our family life.%3Cbr%3ELaughing%3Cbr%3Eabout funny moments%3Cbr%3Ewe've had.%3Cbr%3ESeeing%3Cbr%3Ehow caring you are%3Cbr%3Eas a dad...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI love...%3Cbr%3EBeing a couple%3Cbr%3Eand also best friends.%3Cbr%3ETogether in solving%3Cbr%3Ethe problems%3Cbr%3Elife sends.%3Cbr%3ESupporting each other%3Cbr%3Ein all that we do %26#151;%3Cbr%3EAnd knowing%3Cbr%3EI'm spending forever with you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Top Ten Dad Phrases
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ETop Ten Most Frequently UsedDad Phrases10. Quit tyin%26#146; up the bathroom!9. Get off the darn phone!8. Give it a little gas... No...! Brake! Braaaake!!7. You%26#146;re not leaving this house dressed like that!6. It%26#146;s gonna cost HOW much?!?5. Who turned up the thermostat?!?4. When I was your age. I had to walk through three feet of snow to get to school!3. If you don%26#146;t knock it off. I'm gonna turn this car around and take youright back home!2. Don%26#146;t make me come up there!!And the Number One Most Frequently Used Dad Phrase Is...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGo ask your mother!(Was there ever any doubt?)Happy Father%26#146;s Day. Dad%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: My Father. My Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor My Father%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEven more special%3Cbr%3Eto me%3Cbr%3Ethan all we shared%3Cbr%3Ewhen I was%3Cbr%3Egrowing up...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...is the friendship%3Cbr%3Ewe share today.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Luke%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Reasons to Be Proud Add-a-photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re proving%3Cbr%3Eto be a solid.%3Cbr%3Eresponsible daddy.%3Cbr%3EKenneth...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn your First Father%26#146;s Day.%3Cbr%3Eyou have so many reasons%3Cbr%3Eto be proud %26#151;%3Cbr%3Enot just of your sweet.%3Cbr%3Eprecious child.%3Cbr%3Ebut of your own%3Cbr%3Eglorious self.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEnjoy This Special Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Father Is a Blessing
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom Erica%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Father Is a Blessing%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHe's always there%3Cbr%3Eto lend a hand.%3Cbr%3Eto give advice. to smile.%3Cbr%3ETo comfort or encourage%3Cbr%3Eor just be with you%3Cbr%3Efor a while.%3Cbr%3EHe's a special man%3Cbr%3Ewhose love and caring%3Cbr%3Eseem to have no end %26#151;%3Cbr%3EHe's a teacher and supporter.%3Cbr%3Ehe's your father%3Cbr%3Eand lifelong friend.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Eall of the joys%3Cbr%3Ethat God's blessings%3Cbr%3Ecan bring%3Cbr%3Eon Father's Day%3Cbr%3Eand always.%3Cbr%3E
